name: Week_6_Snake_Runner
description:
Use Space key to change side.

I had little time so I thought about trying the Sprite Pro for the first time to animate my character. Graphics are poor but I really enjoyed making  them. The part of the name "week 6" is because I am making a little prototype game every week for the past 6 weeks now.

Thanks for playing!

Music taken from OpenGameArt.org 

Ted Kerr 2017
